scene: Teen Byte standing on the floor, turned toward the trophy shelf with an expression of pride and admiration

subjects.position: foreground floor, facing the trophy shelf
subjects.action: standing upright and looking up at the 10-day trophy with admiration, content expression

subjects.description: anchor environment: wooden desk with oversized laptop, Chicago skyline visible through simple window behind

subjects.description: wooden trophy shelf mounted on wall above desk, holding exactly one golden 10-day streak trophy on the left side
subjects.position: wall space above desk, left side of shelf

subjects.description: small leafy green succulent plant in pot, healthy and thriving, positioned on the right side of the trophy shelf

subjects.description: single food bowl filled with kibble on the floor to the right

style: pixel art, clean 2D forms, dithered shading, readable silhouette
lighting: bright warm afternoon sunlight streaming through window, golden hues across the room, soft shadows
mood: content and proud, teen Byte admiring hard-earned achievement
background: simple room with Chicago skyline visible through window, afternoon city view
composition: Byte standing on floor facing shelf, desk and laptop in mid-ground, trophy shelf clearly visible above with trophy on left and plant on right, food bowl on floor
